women.description: 4,481 Self-Help Groups formed, ₹80 million microfinance linked, empowering women through capacity building and training.

health.title: Health & Sanitation
health.description: 472 villages certified ODF (Open Defecation Free), clean water access, hygiene promotion, and health awareness programs.

livelihood.title: Livelihood Support
livelihood.description: Dairy, fish farming, masonry training (1,660 trained), and skills development for sustainable income generation.

agriculture.title: Agricultural Support
agriculture.description: 500+ farmer groups supported with improved farming techniques, organic practices, and crop support.

disaster.title: Disaster Response
disaster.description: Emergency response including Cyclone Fani relief (4,500 families) and COVID-19 support for affected communities.

microfinance.title: Microfinance & Bank Linkage
microfinance.description: Facilitating ₹80 million in microfinance linkages, empowering 45,000+ beneficiaries with financial access and literacy.

contact.name: Name

faqs.a1: Your donation directly funds our programs in education, health, women empowerment, and more. We maintain complete transparency with detailed annual reports.
faqs.q2: Can I join as a member remotely?
faqs.a2: Yes! We have opportunities for remote members in areas like content creation, social media, and fundraising support.
faqs.q3: How do I get a donation receipt?
faqs.a3: Donation receipts are automatically sent to your email. You can also request 80G certificates for tax exemption.
faqs.a4: Yes, NHRD is registered under the Societies Registration Act and holds 80G, 12A, FCRA, and NITI Aayog certifications.
